titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and achievements of Katherine Coleman Goble Johnson.
A resolution honoring the life and achievements of Katherine Coleman Goble Johnson.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
This resolution honors the life of Katherine Coleman Goble Johnson and her achievements as a pioneer, physicist, mathematician, and cultural icon.
The Senate also honors and, on behalf of the United States, expresses deep appreciation for the outstanding and important service of Katherine Coleman Goble Johnson to the United States.
